physical_appearance:\The image shows a lithographic print. It is rectangular in shape and \\Rafflesia Patma B1\\ is stated at the bottom centre. Above it are four separate images of the same plant species. The bottom two images show the plant in the earliest stage of its life cycle
subject_terms_1:with its unbloomed flower and a tiny flower emerging respectively. The top two images show the plant in its later life cycles botany
subject_terms_2:with its flower getting bigger and its interior being visible. \ Rafflesiaceae Botany
